name: Pointless (itch) (EitanM)
description:
This game is pointless. There is no point of downloading this game.

press and let go of the left arrow key to move 30 degrees left and the same for the write arrow key. Press the up arrow key to increase speed and the down on to decrease speed. a red triangle will add 1 to your score, a gold will add 3 but be careful of the purple one, it will minus 3 from your score. thanks to TokyoEdtch who made a youtube tutorial for how to make a simmilar game.  

IMPORTANT: If it says developer not verified go to settings, privacy and security, scroll down to POINTLESS and click open anyway.
